title: Influence of Ru-substitution on the performance of pyrochlore catalysts in oxidative steam reforming of ethanol
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, 8,2104-2114
DOI: 10.1039/D3SE01585H, Paper
Yu-Hsuan Huang, Ho-Chen Hsieh, Yun-Hsin Wang, Sheng-Feng Weng, Chi-Shen Lee
This study reveals that La2Zr2−xRuxO7−δ optimizes hydrogen production and ethanol conversion, particularly at a 2.66% Ru concentration, outperforming traditional 5 wt% Ru catalysts through superior long-term stability and efficiency.
